title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-3.2 - Submission of CO[2] budget permit applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-3.2 - Submission of CO[2] budget permit applications

State Regulations

For any CO
2
budget source, the
CO
2
authorized account representative shall submit a
complete application for a facility operating permit or a modification to an
existing facility operating permit in accordance with the provisions of Parts
201 and 621 of this Title and the requirements under section
242-3.3
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-3.2

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
